except not really

and some of you people need to calm down over everything, no the nsa shouldn’t stop their anti terrorism efforts for a source mod… lets not be ridiculous here…

item.title: KOTAKU - The Uncertain Fate of That Incredible-Looking Half-Life Remake
item.dc:creator: JamesKane
item.description:
jindafrom:

That’s probably not going to happen, but I think one of the team members went to Comic-con with Black Mesa on a laptop.

Yep.

I did it the last two years on a fully encrypted laptop. A few souls were able to provide feedback in a secure environment.

Afraid it wont happen this year as I no longer have the laptop in question.

Read full topic
